content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TXPARMCD
      operator: equal_to
      value: ENVTEMPU
    - name: TXVAL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: C
    - name: TXVAL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: F
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.244
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: The units associated with the environmental temperature; only "C" or
  "F" is acceptable.
Outcome:
  Message: The value of TXVAL is not may only be "C" or "F" for TXPARMCD=ENTEMPU
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '244'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The units associated with the environmental temperature;
                  only "C" or "F" is acceptable.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TX

json.Description: The units associated with the environmental temperature; only "C" or "F" is acceptable.

Outcome.Message: The value of TXVAL is not may only be "C" or "F" for TXPARMCD=ENTEMPU

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The units associated with the environmental temperature; only "C" or "F" is acceptable.
